verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and get <S%H3947><s%> from them a rod <S%H4294><s%> for each father's household: <S%H1004><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> rods, <S%H4294><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> their leaders <S%H5387><s%> according to their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%> You shall write <S%H3789><s%> each <S%H376><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> on his rod, <S%H4294><s%>

and write <S%H3789><s%> Aaron's name <S%H8034><s%> on the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Levi; <S%H3878><s%> for there is one <S%H259><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> for the head <S%H7218><s%> [of each] of their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%>

"You shall then deposit <S%H5117><s%> them in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I meet <S%H3259><s%> with you.

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that the rod <S%H4294><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I choose <S%H977><s%> will sprout. <S%H6524><s%> Thus I shall lessen <S%H7918><s%> from upon Myself the grumblings <S%H8519><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are grumbling <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> therefore spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their leaders <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him a rod <S%H4294><s%> apiece, <S%H259><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> leader <S%H5387><s%> according to their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> rods, <S%H4294><s%> with the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their rods. <S%H4294><s%>
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> deposited <S%H5117><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony. <S%H5715><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony; <S%H5715><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> had sprouted <S%H6524><s%> and put <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> buds <S%H6525><s%> and produced <S%H6692><s%> blossoms, <S%H6692><s%> and it bore <S%H1580><s%> ripe <S%H1580><s%> almonds. <S%H8247><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> then brought <S%H3318><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they looked, <S%H7200><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his rod. <S%H4294><s%>

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Put <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> as a sign <S%H226><s%> against the rebels, <S%H4805><s%> that you may put <S%H3615><s%> an end <S%H3615><s%> to their grumblings <S%H8519><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Me, so that they should not die. <S%H4191><s%>"
Thus Moses <S%H4872><s%> did; <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> he did. <S%H6213><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> we perish, <S%H1478><s%> we are dying, we are all <S%H6><s%> dying!

"Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who comes <S%H7131><s%> near, <S%H7131><s%> who comes <S%H7131><s%> near <S%H7131><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> must die. <S%H4191><s%> Are we to perish <S%H1478><s%> completely <S%H8552><s%>?"
